channel.title: Need serious help with my duplicating problem
channel.description: When you drop an item and pick it up, walk far away and back, the item is right back where you dropped it....help please. This is making it easy for the people who play my server to get cash and items! Dont want this lol

item.title: Need serious help with my duplicating problem
item.dc:creator: @xXOwnage xXOwnage
item.description:
@xXOwnage wrote:

Ok here is the problem…the dropped item is not reseting completly therefore making it visable again after returning to the spot after being far away from it…good enough ?

Read full topic
